name: Frolicking Frilecs
description:
This is a demo of a game idea I had.

How to Play:

  • Aim the launch arrow with the mouse. 
  • Click the left mouse button to launch the player character in the direction of the arrow.
  • After the first launch, press "Space" to slow down time and launch again.
  • Each launch will use energy from the energy tube on the right of the screen.
  • Hold "CTRL" & Press "R" to reset the game
